nodes.text: Rengor Vanth was a male journalist who worked for the news agency Sektor 242 NewsLine. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, Vanth interviewed the bounty hunter Malis about his profession. The pair met in a bar and Vanth had originally planned to record footage of their meeting on a holocamera, but Malis requested that Vanth instead use a holorecorder to obtain an audio-only recording of their encounter.
